title: insanely weird lag issue

embed.description: Watch branlap01's League of Legends video: thats fuking lag people - Plays.tv

body:
So i played 3 games today, the first two games went fine but when it came to the third one right from the get go my thresh started acting weirdly. i looked my ping and it was a 87 (i usually have 45). most people could agree that 80 ping isn't that bad. but for some reason everything i was doing in game was delayed but about 5 to 10 sometimes even more then a minute. i would to no if the issue is on my end of the game's. Or even if other people encountered the same issue.

TY very much for any responses,

and have a great day

i added a proof of what i could get from that game, it didn't all record... reasons.

replies.body:
so i have ran the test and this is the result i got for this game. i had some netlog that had no data prob because i tried to re-log multiple times. Im not sure how to full on show you the graph with my results but my amount of packet loss was 38.76% with an average ping of about 85 ms.

TY for the feedback.

That's a pretty substantial loss of data.  Thanks for the follow up, and don't worry!  Now that we have a better picture of what's going on, I believe  the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide will have the steps to help get this squared away.  Go through each step to tune up your connection and resolve whatever is causing the network issue to happen.  Hope it helps!

It sounds like you're suffering from packet loss here, which can be caused by a few different factors like how your ISP routes to the game servers, your network, or something else entirely.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for the match to get an overview of what's going on.  Any results from other matches can help as well!  Let me know what you find.
